resources.string: Toggling Xternal Display...\nCheck the notification bar.
Welcome to Xternal Display! Run this app once to toggle HDMI support on, then again to turn it off.\n\nTo switch back to your phone display at any time, just unplug your HDMI cable.
Failed to initialize! Please restart the application.
HDMI detected! Connecting to TV...\nYou should look at your TV now.
HDMI cable disconnected! Reconnect to display on TV.
Display failed! Please restart the application.

Important notes:
1. This application only works on the Motorola Droid X.
2. When HDMI is connected, your phone's built-in screen will not update.
3. Disconnect the HDMI cable to resume normal phone usage.
Sorry, this application probably doesn\'t support your phone.
